//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 DNEResolution;
//   float4 MinZ_MaxZRatio;
//   float NvStereoEnabled;
//   sampler2D NvStereoFixTexture;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_0;
//   sampler2D SceneColorTexture;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_0;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_1;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                    Reg   Size
//   ----------------------- ----- ----
//   DNEResolution           c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias c1       1
//   MinZ_MaxZRatio          c2       1
//   NvStereoEnabled         c3       1
//   UniformPixelVector_0    c7       1
//   UniformPixelVector_1    c8       1
//   SceneColorTexture       s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture      s1       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0        s2       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c4, 0.0625, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c5, 0.0078125, 1, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord4 v0.w
    dcl_texcoord5 v1.w
    dcl_texcoord v2.xy
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2

// Redundant Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --auto-fix-unreal-dne-reflection --only-autofixed --quiet CRC32_8A5AEAA3_4993.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

    mad r0.xy, vPos, c0, c0.zwzw
    mul r0.xy, r0, v1.w
    rcp r1.x, v1.w
    mul r1.xy, r0, r1.x
    mad r1.xy, r1, c1, c1.wzzw
    texld r1, r1, s0
    add r1.xyz, r1, c8.w
    mov r2.xyz, c8
    mad_pp r1.xyz, r2, r1, c7
    texld r2, v2, s2
    abs r1.w, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r3, c4, s1
      add r2.x, -r3.y, v1.w
      mad r0.z, r3.x, r2.x, r0.x
      mov r0.w, v1.w
      mov r2.xzw, r0.zyyw
    else
      mov r2.xzw, c4.y
    endif
    mov r0.z, v1.w
    cmp r0.xyz, -r1.w, r0, r2.xzww
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    add r0.x, r0.w, -c2.y
    add r0.y, -r0.x, c4.z
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    cmp r0.x, r0.y, c4.w, r0.x
    mad r0.x, c2.x, r0.x, -v1.w
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.x, c5.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, c5.y
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, r2.y
    mul r0.yzw, r1.xxyz, v0.w
    mul_pp oC0.xyz, r0.x, r0.yzww
    mov oC0.w, c4.y

// approximately 41 instruction slots used (5 texture, 36 arithmetic)
